Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2009 03:24AM MaggieTheArtist wrote: hi katiec -- thank you so much for your reply.  I'm still a bit nervous, but am preparing to take it easy next week.  I just talked to the nurse and she told me that they are going to have a pathologist there and will do a frozen section (?) so will have a pretty good idea of what we're dealing with that same day...  which on one hand is good but on the other hand makes me even more nervous... I can't take pain meds -- they make me crazy sick, so I'm just planning on taking it very easy and letting others help out with the kids and stuff.  hope you enjoyed your shower!  lol -- having had other surgeries where you can't have a shower for a while, I know how that goes! crossing my fingers for good results for you, m.
Posts.Title: having excisional biopsy done monday MaggieTheArtist clariceak

Posts.Content: Aug 28, 2009 01:36AM MaggieTheArtist wrote: When I found this board this morning, I noticed I had been here before... in '07... just went back to re-read the posts to notice it was the same breast, and the breast specialist told me it was probably fat necrosis...  here's my question: what is the nature of fat necrosis?  if it was going to grow, wouldn't it have done so before?  does it get bigger?  my reduction was done in Aug 06, then in '07 was when my gyn found a lump, and then nothing until now... any thoughts?
